transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> AsItis
AsItis derive(CustomerID = toString(byName('_col1_')),
		TerritoryID = toString(byName('_col2_')),
		PurchaseOrderNo = toString(byName('_col3_')),
		SalePersonID = toString(byName('_col4_')),
		ListPrice = toDecimal(byName('_col5_'),10,2),
		ProductNo = toString(byName('_col6_')),
		Product = toString(byName('_col7_')),
		UnitPrice = toDecimal(byName('_col8_'),10,2),
		Discount = toDecimal(byName('_col9_'),10,2),
		Qty = toInteger(byName('_col10_'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 derive(OrdLineTot = UnitPrice * Qty,
		ProcessDate = currentDate()) ~> AddOneMore
